name: Intro
_source: s;Simon;The mythical Albreides Ridge in the heart of the mountains...
s;Simon;Those battlements, they're the same as the ones in the Fates' vision.
s;Simon;And that knight... {w}it looks like the ones leading the dragon's armies.
s;Anuki;Hey Simon, you alright?{w}{br}You look like you've seen a ghost.
s;Anuki;If we're going to cross this ridge, you need to focus.
s;Simon;Yeah, sorry.{w} I just feel like I've seen this all before.
s;Simon;Actually, yes.{w} I think I saw a vision of this place from the past.{w}{br}Something from one of the Fates.
s;Anuki;Father said he had something similar once.{w}{br}A vision from Atropos about the fall of previous houses on Morrissey land... {w}{br}or something like that.
s;Anuki;He's been trying to see something like it ever since.{w}{br}A few years ago, he even made a pilgrimage to Atropos's shrine.
s;Anuki;Those were the worst weeks of my life.{w}{br}Brandt was in charge, and he ran the place like a prison.
s;Simon;I can't say I'd like to see a vision like that again though.{w}{br}Pretty unpleasant stuff.
s;Anuki;Yeah?{w} Well, we're in for a whole lot more unpleasant stuff here.{w}{br}You see all these bandits?
s;Anuki;For such a hard-to-reach spot, it's pretty overrun.{w}{br}The bandits must've heard rumors about "the dragon's treasure" or something like that.
s;Simon;Yeah, but they'll have a rough time taking it.{w}{br}See that knight?
s;Anuki;The one with the big axe? Yeah, I see him.
s;Simon;Knights like that were in my vision.{w}{br}They seemed near-unkillable.
s;Simon;So, uh, try not to engage, alright?
s;Anuki;Yeah, yeah.{w}{br}Well, see you on the battlefield.{w}{br}And if there is some dragon gold back there, House Morrissey's getting 60 percent.
s;Melodie;These damn bandits.{w}{br}Try to do some good and restore this dump to a more natural state, and they try to kill you.
s;Melodie;But hey, maybe that group down there might be a bit more reasonable...
s;Melodie;The name's Melodie, and I'm looking to clean this place up a bit.{w}{br}All the battlements and old artifacts are a real eyesore, you know?
s;Melodie;But you mind helping me clear out these bandits?{w}{br}Kinda hard to get work done with a bunch of people trying to kill you.
s;Simon;Uh, sure? {w}We could really use the help too.
s;Melodie;Perfect. Let's cause some chaos, shall we?
speak;Narrator;There are tomes scattered across the map that can affect MOV.{w}{br}Speed tomes will increase allies' MOV by 3 when destroyed.;StyleNid=hint
speak;Narrator;Slow tomes will reduce enemies' MOV by 3 when destroyed.;StyleNid=hint
